text: Evergy is an electric utility in Kansas City, Missouri, United States. The company was created from a merger of Westar Energy of Topeka and Great Plains Energy of Kansas City, Missouri. Evergy is the largest electric company in Kansas. They serve 690,000 residential, commercial and industrial customersEvergy summary, Reuters, October 8, 2013 in the eastern third of Kansas. == References == == Other websites == * Category:20th-century establishments in Kansas Category:1909 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Missouri Category:Electric power companies Category:Kansas City, Missouri Category:Companies listed on NASDAQ Category:Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange
title: Evergy
